name: The Sex Game Lite
description:
The Sex Game Lite is a Roullete game based on The Sex Game! The Sex Game Lite increases the amusement of the couple between four walls and the intimacy of the couple because helps to reveal the thoughts and intentions of the partner, also provides a more pleasurable sexual intercourse due to internal events and excitement created by the game.

The game just wants you to have fun with your couple. The loser will do your partner's sexual desires for 1 hour!
The game so far has more than 80 cards of internal events plus the events of the board, such as: kiss, drink a dose, take a piece of clothing, etc..

Download, enjoy and have fun with your partner!

It just depends on you to improve your relationship having some fun!
